src_original: oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāya jñāna sūviniścita tejo rājāya statha-āgatāyarhante sa (39)  myaka sambuddhāya ||  tadyathā ||  oṁ pūṇya 2 mahāpūṇya aparimitā pūṇya aparimitāya pūṇyajñāna saṁbhāro pacite ||  oṁ sarva sasa kāra pariśraddha dharmmate gagaṇa samudagate svabhāva viśūddha mahānayaparivāre svāhā || 17 ||  yaḥ idaṁ aparimitāyaḥ sutraṁ likhaṣyaṁti likhāpayaṣyaṁti tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ saman vaddhāra kṣāvarṇa guptiṁ kariṣyaṁti ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāyaḥ jñāna sūviniścita tejo rājāyaḥ tathāgatāyārhante samyaka sambuddhāya ||

idaṁ ma parimitāyūḥ sutraṁ likhi (41)  oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitoyū jñāna sūviniścita tejo raye sa tathāgatāya arhante samyakasambuddhāya ||  tadyathā ||  oṁ pūṇya 2 mahāpūṇya-aparimittapūṇya aparimitāyū pūṇya jñāna saṁbhāro pacite ||
oṁ sarvasaskāra pariśuddha dharmete gagana samadra te svabhāva viśuddhe mahānaya parivāre svāhā || 21 ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāyū jñāna saviniścita tejo rājāyasa tathāgatāya arhante samyaksaṁbuddhāya ||
tadyathā ||  oṁ pūṇya mahāpūṇya aparimitapūṇya aparimitāyū pūṇya jñāna saṁbhārā pacite ||  oṁ sarva saskāra pariśuddha (44)
oṁ sarva saṁskāra pariśuddha dharmma tegagaṇaṁsamaṅgate svabhāgava viśuddha mahānaya paripāresvāhā |
